sql.name: commitinformationpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: commitinformationpage.link
sql.item: select t.c1 baseid, t.c802000102 baseschema, t.c802000001 as 填写人, t.c802000002 as 所属单位, t.c802000103 as 上报填写类型, t.c802000003 上报日期, t.c802000028 as 备注 from {100} t where 1=1 {5} {1}
